language.entry: Voivode
Beware nightfall, for he watches and waits for those who stray from torchlight.
Beware nightfall, for he watches and waits for those who stray from torchlight.
Beware nightfall, for he watches and waits for those who stray from torchlight.
Transform
Flock of Bats
Shadowplay
Soulfeast
Rising
Echolocate
Obey!
Move
Transform
Flock of Bats
Shadowplay
Soulfeast
Rising
Echolocate
Obey!
High Manners
Essence of Vileness
Bestial Claw
Twisted Claw
"Wings of Malice"
Predator's Wings
Fine Doublet
Governor's Jerkin
Ornate Costume
Heretical Silk
"Tunic of the Moroii"
Noble Clothing

He is in command of the shadows themselves. His covenant with the dark allows him to command swarms of flying vermin, or to bend the mind of the weak to his will. In sinister anticipation he merges with the shadows, striking unseen from the dark. In his Strigoi form, he becomes a lethal nocturnal predator, hunting his prey to feed on their very souls.

A terrible nature hides behind eyes of noble origin, exquisite manners, expensive jewelry and permanent delusions of grandeur. He can transmute his hands into clawed wings. These allow him to fly over his prey, dive down in the right moment, ravaging them with supernatural ferocity.

Feared by the religious, the Dark Shepert can call upon the creatures of the night. He can transfere is curse by sharing his very essence with his disciples. In his malignance he impales the bodies of the fallen, to terrify anyone who dares to approach.
UNHOLY BAPTISM
LINEAGE
CHILDREN OF THE NIGHT
AWAY FROM ME!
IMPALE THE FALLEN
{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 4 pts/rd for 3 rds
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Removed if Torch above 25{colour_end}
Produce {colour_start|notable}Eternal Goblet{colour_end}
Why doesn't anyone want to sleep near me?
Let the night embrace us all.
I'll keep watch. I'm a night owl, not so good in the daytime.
There was a time when I drank in golden goblets. It almost hurts to remember them.
Last night I met a wonderful and elegant girl. I think she will be buried tomorrow.
Your conversation is so boring...
Go ahead, sleep my cattle, there is nothing to fear
I hope there are more enemies to fight. I haven't satiated my appetite yet.
I don't think that fire keeps me warm...
Dont eat like animals! Mind your manners peasants!
Anyone wants to share a drink with me?
When your grandfather was young I was already ancient.
There is no poison or sword that can break this flesh.
We don't want to waste all that precious vitality, do we now?
I have forgotten what pain feels like.
...Which is poured out for many for the forgiveness of sins...
Do not be afraid, it's just a sip...
I will be your chalice.
Your god is the one who gives you to drink!
You haven't tasted anything like this. I guarantee it...
Embrace the dark. Let us cavort with the shadows of the night.
Your praiseworthy feats have instilled fear in the enemy. I can smell it from here ...
Our mission is coming to an end, victory is near and with it will come our reward!
Don't worry, The shadows are my allies, and they will protect us.
I'm sure you can handle it all! May the Dark be within you
If you feel your god doesn't watch over you, you may always come to me.
Do not fear death, come... Rest your head on my shoulder and close your eyes.
You don't have to be afraid of me. I know what it is to be... different.
It's admirable how you have fought, for such a... limited creature.
Look, the full moon rises in the sky...
The children of the night, what sweet music they play...
Come to me, my siblings. Hearken to my call!
At my age the pain of others exudes certain... beauty.
MOVE THAT FILTH AWAY FROM ME!!
I thought we agreed to put away those things!!
Don't put your faith in such trinkets of deceit!
HSSSSS! STAY BACK!
Behold the fragility of your idols!!
HAHAHAHA...You have to have faith for this to work on me!
UP! RAISE IT UP! This one was still alive.
Does it smell good up there? HAHAHAHAHA!
I'll make a forest with our enemies...
Let the agony of them be seen from a distance! Let them know who they face!
FEar cuts deeper than their swords!
The Voivode's essence. Use to cure {colour_start|debuff}Mortality Debuffs{colour_end} and {colour_start|disease}Diseases{colour_end}. Become {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkspawn{colour_end}.
Eternal Goblet
This is not supposed to drop.
Strange Goblet
On Leather Wings
A plague of strange bats has come from afar. These creatures seem to follow an unnatural course. With luck, at dawn they will be gone... they are just animals, aren't they?
Grim Influence
A thick and hazy mist has engulfed the hamlet. The bells have rung, the curfew has begun. The abbots locked themself in the transept. Only the most wicked of creatures roam the alleys this night
Sympathy for the Devil
In the middle of the mist, a prominent foreigner arrives at the Tavern. His manners seem refined, his presence imposing and his intentions... dark.
A Macabre Incident
A well-known prostitute has been found lifeless. Her withered body rests in the cold shadows of the alleyway. Whatever murdered her wasn't human.
Prince of Darkness
The Dark Prince has risen. His most loyal and experienced servants, side with the hamlet against a greater common evil, for now ...
I am the one who commands the undead, you fool!
I am very familiar with these energies...
Cursing a cursed man? How droll.
These waters are my home now!
These waters are my home now!
My eyes clear!
I shall obey to my queen!
Listen my spawns. You shall bow to the queen!
Wicked witch! You shall listen my commands now!
Wicked witch! Teach me that trick!
I know a succubus who knows a similar trick!
I'm dying? But ...I was promised pleasure?!
You are nothing compared to the darkness I return to !!!
I never thought this moment would come. Killing Death itself, how ironic...
Death is my companion, you just bring us closer together!
Not me! Kill them first!
Fool. Do you think my death can save you from me? I ALWAYS return.
Never thought this moment would come. Killing Death itself, how ironic...
Your soul smells like honey and nuts...
Your vitality makes me salivate...
I will be satisfied with your life!
You don't know who you are facing, do you?
Kneel before me!
I have not lived this long to be cowed by the likes of you!
Don't you recognize death when it stares you in the face?
HAHAHAHAHA.... SUFFER!
{colour_start|voivode_colour}BEHOLD THE TRUE POWER!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}KNEEL BEFORE THE MASTER!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I AM THE TERROR THAT NESTS IN YOUR NIGHTMARES!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I AM THE NIGHT!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I FEAST ON YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}YOU WILL NOTHING BUT FOOD FOR THE IMMORTAL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}QUAIL BEFORE ME!{colour_end}
The dead should not leave their graves...
I refuse to travel with that wicked thing!
The Patron of the Dark! I won't travvel with thee
I will not serve with this... creature.
Poor idiot. How easy it is to deceive you with promises of salvation.
I can't stand the ramblings of that ridiculous puppet.
"The Flame" what a hopeless endevour to believe in such illusion
And share all those innocent lives with you? Never.
This is MY cattle. Find your own herd!
I am the true master!
I don't intend on treating you as an equal...
Poor idiot. How easy it is to deceive you with promises of salvation.
I can't stand the psalms of that ridiculous puppet.
Just being near this place makes me nauseous...
What a pitifull place! I had a hamlet surrounded by impenatratable walls!
I deserve more than serving with this mortal scum!
ake me your ally and i make you my slace !
Well, this place is...underwhelming.
May I introduce myself, Radu, pleasure to met another lord.
Gold and glory await? Peh, I am after something beyond this.
I was once lord of such place myself.
Look twice, I am not like the usual scum you see lurking around here.
Fools! You think you can find glory or salvation in this place ?
Hepfully the journy did not damage my excelent clothingg to much.
I knew your ancestor, what a man of unsuspected exelence.
This place - what a beatiful nightmare!
I got the message your ancestor, my old friend perished. Le me be of of assitance to bring his town to former glory.
You are diferent from your ancestor. Your eyes have not seen what he has, I can feel it!
I wass already old when this hamlet was nothing but wilderness.
A shame someone like me relies on such mundane transpaortation.
Your ancestor was a man of exelent manners, unlike you.
The last time I visited this place was in a much better shape.
Your barracks are full! Make place for me, or send away one of these worthless slaves you maintain
Prepare my thralls i am ready to feast!
I shall be a soldier against corruption!
There is nothing to fear for me They will fear me!
I am not IN danger, I am THE danger!
I was born for this.
Go bring me more disciples. They need to learn the truth!
I am the dark!
Anything is better than sitting around this dump.
Send me out! I didn't feast for ages!
Prepare the thralls, I wish to hunt!
What a beatiuful clear night to hunt!
My old bones can hardly bear this any more ...
I dont need consolations, i need to FEAST!
A-alright, I can do one more run.
Pff, better treat me more apropriate this time!
Fine i will join you pesky mortals.
Give this old man a week of rest
Would you kindly pick someone else
I knew this would not be easy.
P-please not again!
I can't - I won't go back!
There is something terrible here, I can feel it!
I can't get the horrible images out of my head...
I need respite!
A lord like me needs some rest after the curretn efforts !
I am in no shape to go back out there.
The horrors I've seen. I do not know if I can handle any more.
I need to do something to take my mind off of this.
Drink, god, or dice. I care not what as long as it distracts me.
Not another expedition -anything but that!
I just cannot bear the thought of going back down there.
I...cannot...go back.
The next mission could mean my doom! I-I'm not ready.
No...please don't send me.
Send some of my spawns! I cannot bear this!
They want to burn me for what i am!
They want to drive a flock through my heart! I can smell their fear!
Do NOT cast your gaze upon me! I know your foul intent!
My flesh is immortal my pain eternal ...
This night is darker than what lies within me
The future only holds death and bloodshed...
Some of that gold should be coming back to me, for my efforts!
Tailor me new clothes, worthy of alord like me!
This is the thanks for haring my royal presence with you!?
Foolish peasants. Arre you not aware i am a lord!
Give me a bite of yours! I need to be ready!
Mewling lambs - all of you!
Send me back down! I RELISH THE PAIN!
Hahaha each scar is a beatiful memory!
HAHAHAHA, sweet pain my brother !
Ha ha ha! Hee hee!
It writhes, it flips, but yet it says nothing!
One thousand eyes - staring, blinking! They want me back!
<glug glug>
More wine, sir!
Delicious, satisfying - MORE!
What a refreshing time to be amongst mortals
Drink! The wine will never stop I promise!
Fill up the goblets! This night goes on me!
Ahhh, it's so good when it hits your lips!
I don't need a glass. I have my own goblet!
May I offer you a sip of a special wine?
Roll those dice again. This one is mine!
I'm all in! What a rush!
If you cheat on me i will take anything back after your death!
Flip that card - Dog's Moon it is!
Prepare yourself for immortal indurance!
I-incredible!
I'm not THAT flexible!
IDo not be afraid, my hunger is of a diferent nature tonight
The taste of fresh youth ...
The room...it spins!
I know, I know. This is for mine own good.
Are you sure you cn lock me in ?
You cannot cure what lies within me!
Unlock this door! I am cured - or am I?!
Curing me?! HAHAAHAHA!
These leeches share a familiar hunger
I am not sick this is part of what I am !
A pitfiful mortal disease overcomes smeone like me, how shameful
What lies withing me cannot be cured with your mortal aparatas!
You cannot cure death himself! HAHAHAHA!
This quest is beyond my experience.
Not even I would delve into such darkness!
This is suicide send one of my spawns instead!
My old bones cannot handle this task an more !
I wouldn't last a minute!
I refuse! Sacrifice a slave instead of me!
I won't waste my talents on that trivial errand.
This quest is beneath my experience.
Who you sthink you are ending on such a mundane mission ?!
This task is for the weak and mortals!
Hah - such mundane play is nothin for someone of my exelence!
This is no apropriate task for someone of my status.
Feh - I am beyond this. Send one of my spawns instead
I a a lord, I will not run such meaningless errands
{colour_start|voivode_colour}SKREEEEECH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}GRAAAGGHHH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}SHHHHHAAARG!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}YHAAAAAARG!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}GRRRRRRR...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}RAAAAAAAAAH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}REEEEEEEE!!!{colour_end}
Agh! The Light, it burns!
Your real mission is to destroy me! I know, you will not deceive me with your pathetic subterfuge!
I will get some beautiful screams out of you!
I blame ALL OF YOU! Ignorant apes...
Hmph. The shepherd doesn't obey the orders of his sheep.
My existence is an endless curse...
I am the fountain, the revelation and the life!
Go ahead, I can see the fear in the eyes of those rats!
Kneel and obey the master's word!
The devil knows because he is the devil, but he knows more because heÂ’s old.
HAHAHAHAHA...Is that all you can muster?
I will lead you to victory, as in the old days.
You can't kill me! I am eternal!
Worse things I have unlived...
Do not fear the darkness, for it is our ally.
Bear up, fight with courage or you will know my anger!
At my order... ATTACK!
I will rip the flesh off their bones!
Hah! They just pierced one of my lungs, and yet I felt nothing!
I have a pike that bears your name...
A monster. I am a monster!
I used to be a noble. What have I done?
What a sick joke, that I should bear this curse and not be granted the mercy of death.
The dawn is near to arrive, I must return!
The light has abandoned me, and you with it!
The damn Light! There is too much light!
See how blood does not come from my wounds!
Finish this damn existence!
I'm just a shell full of misery
Shut your traps and OBEY!
I am surrounded by idiots.
Really?... And why should I care about your opinion?
Teaming up with you lot was a mistake!
Things must be done my way!
I will do what I consider convenient for myself
Is... Is that garlic?
That symbol, it burns! It freezes!
That crack in the wall! The dawn is coming!
And death will be covered with glory the glory of our bodies!
Let the darkness flood everything...
I will be the father of your rebirth!
Get that symbol away from me!
Is that a crucifix?... ARGHHHHHH!!
They stink of garlic!
I will not turn my back to you...
I know your intentions al too well!
I will not fall in your trap.
Leave it to me!
Death calls me to duty!
I want something that makes me feel alive!
Death hides from me!
I can hear the voices of those whose lives I snatched.
And the seas will be dyed in red...
No, it can't be...
Why are we fighting? This makes no sense!
I'm just a shadow for the world...
I will have your head!
Allow me to
Oh, who are we kidding. It is pointless to attack me.
This is no place for me.
I am the one who commands here!
Do I have to show you how to do everything?
You are the ones who should do the dirty work!
I will not risk myself for you.
Take my place. You are expendable, after all.
This thirst burns me inside!
Life escapes from this hollow bones...
I feel weak and old ...
Now I see it clearly, you are the enemy!
Follwing your orders will lead us all to destruction!
Wait... Why am I paying attention to you?
I said NO!
Who are you to give orders to me?
Silence. I will do as I please.
Kill each other, I will enjoy the show.
The deep red of the blood is so ... hypnotic.
Let me enjoy the scent of death.
My powers have abandoned me!
My destiny is not among you!
The darkness envelops us between shrieks of madness!
You won't be the one to tell me what to do!
I will take the initiative!
I won't let myself be guided by traitors!
I've been longing for my end!
Come on! Hurt me if you can!
There will be no redemption for me!
Contemplate the true power of darkness!
Keep your pitiful advice for those who need it!
Your lack of decision has brought us nothing but disgrace!
None of these vermin are worthy rivals.
I am my own leader!
Shut up and watch how it's done!
The value of the battle is measured in bloodshed.
I want to hear you scream!
I'll gut you like a fish!
SHHHH ... Silence!
I've lived this before ... and I know how it ends.
Do you really think that I have believed your intentions?
I will know what to do...
Maybe you are more useful as food than as companions.
Go ahead ... rest ... I will watch you closely.
Any of your lives could quench my thirst.
I refuse to sleep, lest I wake up pierced by wood.
Do not even think about praying. I can hear you.
You are no better than the rats we have left behind us.
Give me a reason why I shouldn't end you here and now.
I am destined to guide you to an accurate death.
Being on my side has condemned you all.
This mission will take us all to hell!
Are you going to continue saying such idiocies?
Why do not you do us a favor by cutting out your tongue?
Last night I met a wonderful and elegant girl. I think she will be buried tomorrow.
Go ahead, rest. Hopefully you will not wake up.
It seems that enduring you is another hellish punishment...
I'm surrounded by idiots...
It's obvious that you aren`t up to the task.
Don't bother healing that wound, in the end we'll have to amputate.
The scavengers looks at you with hungry eyes ... I understand why
Please, don't bother to suppress your agony.
There is no hope... for you.
We are guided by a moon dyed red!
I could cut my veins and they would only sprout dust
Come on! Come to me!
Pierce this lifeless heart!
It's been long since the last time I felt pain...
Dare to face me!
I can see the end of the tunnel...
Serve all to the EVERLASTING MASTER!
Don't get close to me!
We are here because of your fault!
You will learn to do things well...
Death will be more useful to us!
I know your mission is to end me!
Your voice will join the ones of those I have left behind!
You are no more than cattle!
I shall feast on you!
I'm just a shell full of misery
I want something that makes me feel alive!
Contemplate my entrails!
There is no pleasure sweeter than the agony itself
Only pain will make us free!
I am my own enemy!
There is no hope for you cowards!
Where do you think you're going?
...When the best part starts?
You have not suffered enough yet ...
If I fall, you will fall with me!
We are not going anywhere.
Don't resist the embrace of the darkness.
The sun sets for us all.
I can't stand this famine!
Hunger devours me inside!
The guilt rests on me!
Don't worry, I can do your dirty work...
Is this what you wanted?
Let me show you how it's done...
I don't need anyone's help to die!
Let death embrace me!
YAAAAARGH!!
Let the darkness flood everything...
The smell of your soul is so...distracting.
Before, I need to feed.
I don't intend to give you that satisfaction.
I don't have it very clear...
There's no life left within this body!
I don't care...
I'm just a shadow for the world...
The die is cast...for you.
You will die if it ensures my safety!
I don't intend to die because of your stupidity!
I'll teach you how to do things right, CUR.
You deserve a correction for your mistakes!
Crawl to my feet, mortal!
Let your soul serve me!
You are too weak for this!
The force abandons you!
I know your intentions... traitor
You are the real enemy...
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
Carrying on with you is a monstrous existence.
You should have stayed in your cave...
As expected...
There is no glory for those who don't serve me.
Only I will get rid of worms and flies.
that's the energy I need to ingest!
Share your life force with me!
Hmm...pure theater
It shows my influence...
Let the blood run...
Really?
Come on, it's just a scratch.
Your pained gesture is quite amusing.
No head will remain on those shoulders.
This is the beginning of the end.
You will be more useful as sustenance for immortals!
So much combat is opening my appetite.
You should have left it to me!
Hmm... easy.
The moon will swallow the sun ... forever.
I have rats in my throat!
Wherever you go ... I have my eyes on you.
Please, let me smell you more closely.
Won't you think to escape?
Erase that from your mind.
Don't avoid the pain!
(sadistic and threatening smile)
(intense and threatening gaze)
Stay, you miserable wretch!
Wherever you go, your shadow will not stop chasing you.
It's fun to see you running like a beaten dog.
Won't you be consecrated?
I know you're looking for a crucifix, you traitor!
It won't be necessary.
That won't save you from my hunger.
That will not prevent your agony, nor my pleasure.
Your expression reminds me of how the pain felt.
Do not put your faith in those trinkets of trickery.
Nothing will prevent you from ending up as food for the vermin.
Move that light away from me!
Do you intend for me to embrace your parlor tricks?
I'm not going to trust you, or your cheap tricks.
Let me enjoy the agony...
I don't need your help.
Hah. Think again.
You can't heal that which is already dead.
Calm, I've already died other times...
I don't need the bowels inside to fight.
That light burns me like the sun ... turn it off!
Focus your tricks on those who need them.
Nothing will prevent the flesh from falling off my bones.
I won't let you get close to me!
I know that your intention is not to help me.
Put your hands where I can see them, miserable worm!
There's no life left within this body.
I've been longing for my end.
Let me alone with my pain...
Seriously, I'm enjoying this.
My strength comes only from the pain of my enemies.
I will face them with my naked claws.
There is no rat that can defend the wolf.
(awkward silence)
Exactly... what are you trying to do?.
- {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkness{colour_end}
Each point of missign {colour_start|wos_rarity} Torchlight{colour_end} equals 1 point of {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkness{colour_end}
- {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkbrood{colour_end}
x
- {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkspawn{colour_end}
x
- {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkspawn - Frenzy{colour_end}
x
- {colour_start|voivode_colour}Darkbrood{colour_end} - {colour_start|notable}Cleansing{colour_end}
x
The creatures of the night are under my command!
Don't leave a drop of blood on their bodies!
A cloud of wings and fangs will be your tomb!
Fly, my brothers, fly and feast!
Crawl under my feet, insect!
Your master commands you!
Bow down under my will!
Kneel before thine new master!
It is pointless to resist...
Your will is weaker than your appearance !
Come, walk towards me, slowly.
Crouch before my feet, maggot!
OBEY !!!
Darkness, shadow and gloom. bring our foes their DOOM!
The shadows will be our sword...
They can not see me... but I can see them...
Let them approach me...
I will be closer to you than your own shaddow
Fear not the dark my friend
Where did all these shadows come from?
The shadows moves under under my feet!
Where is the old man ?!
And suddenly the dark ...
And suddenly the dark ...
Such a maligent creature!
What a cruel twist of events!
I knew he was hiding something!
This is his true face!
How can he keep his warderobe on ?
Raaah away with that thing !
Tis tiwsted thing is none of us !
How did two of us get in one party ?! Wicked Magic !
How did two of us get in one party ?! Wicked Magic !
How did two of us get in one party ?! Wicked Magic !
How did two of us get in one party ?! Wicked Magic !
How did two of us get in one party ?! Wicked Magic !
Where did all these shadows come from?
Neat little trick can you teach that to me
Ohh a Strigoi. Centuries I last seen a living one
Radu is that neccesary? Im immortal no need to guard me
How kind of you Radu. I might reward your old bones later ...
You know i can pick who guards me myself. But thanks
Hide in the shadows old man. Not anyone cn be like me
The dark is part of the cycle
No man but a beast, lurking in the dark
The beast within you is different from mine ...
My eyes can see past your darkness. I see the beast within
You also bear a curse, though your no brother ...
You can understand my burder
Look how they shunned me! Keep your distance from them
The flame can not tolerate such evil play!
Remind yourself, we are only allies in battle!
After this is over, remind me to purge you wicked creature!
Two wicked kings ... One common evil
You were a lord like me, dont put yourself in my service!
Wich dark times. I need the service of another wicked king!
That is different of anything what i've seen. Thouhg strangly akin
Use this again! What a phenomenal display for research!
I see what you do! And I learn ...
Intriguing. I could never could call the one you serve
Your god is no stranger to me.
I can see through the dark veil !
Advanced darkness !!!
These shadows are deeper than anything I could hide in !
What ? Wasn't i supposed to do that ?
*laughs meniacly* What a beatifull trick !
*sings* fear of the dark !!!
*sings* welcome o the black parade !!!
I can hear the Hells Bells ring!!!
*sings* I am a man who walks alone And when I'm walking a dark road !!!
Calm down doggo! There's nothing to fear
*dog barks wildly* Shhht calm down what are oyu barking at ?
Wich is your true form? Ask my mirror
Wich is your true form? Ask my mirror
How kind of you Radu. I might reward your old bones later ...
You know i can pick who guards me myself. But thanks
Hide in the shadows old man. Not anyone cn be like me
The dark is part of the cycle
No man but a beast, lurking in the dark
The beast within you is different from mine ...
My eyes can see past your darkness. I see the beast within
